name: expedia_scrape_reviews
description: Scrape reviews from an Expedia hotel page. Returns guest reviews with rating, title, content, date, traveler type, and positive/negative highlights.

steps.code: const reviews = []; const reviewSection = document.querySelector('[data-stid="section-reviews"], section[id*="review"]'); const reviewEls = reviewSection ? reviewSection.querySelectorAll('article, [itemprop="review"], [data-stid*="review-card"]') : document.querySelectorAll('[itemprop="review"], [data-stid*="review-card"]'); if (reviewEls.length === 0) { const altReviews = document.querySelectorAll('[data-stid*="review"]'); altReviews.forEach(function(el) { if (el.querySelector('time') || el.querySelector('[itemprop="datePublished"]')) { const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="out of"], span.is-visually-hidden'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h4, strong'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('p, [itemprop="reviewBody"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [itemprop="datePublished"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('[itemprop="author"], strong'); reviews.push({ rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', traveler_type: '', positive: '', negative: '' }); } }); } else { for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(reviewEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = reviewEls[i]; const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="out of"], span.is-visually-hidden'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h4, strong'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('p, [itemprop="reviewBody"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [itemprop="datePublished"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('[itemprop="author"], strong'); const travelerTypeEl = el.querySelector('[data-stid*="traveler"], [aria-label*="trip"]'); const positiveEl = el.querySelector('[data-stid*="liked"], [aria-label*="liked"]'); const negativeEl = el.querySelector('[data-stid*="disliked"], [aria-label*="disliked"]'); reviews.push({ rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', traveler_type: travelerTypeEl ? travelerTypeEl.textContent.trim() : '', positive: positiveEl ? positiveEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', negative: negativeEl ? negativeEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '' }); } } const overallEl = document.querySelector('[data-stid="reviews"] span.is-visually-hidden, [aria-label*="overall rating"]'); const totalEl = document.querySelector('[data-stid="reviews"] span[aria-hidden="true"], [aria-label*="reviews"]'); return { overall_rating: overallEl ? overallEl.textContent.trim() : '', total_reviews: totalEl ? totalEl.textContent.trim() : '', scraped_count: reviews.length, reviews: reviews, url: window.location.href }
